name: strong films
tag_list: film-services, video-services, film-consultation, video-consultation, viral-consultation, creative-consultation, creative-video, creative-film, story-consultation, storycentric-video, storycentric-film, honest-storytelling, authentic-storytelling, brand-c
overview:
strong films™ humanizes brands through story, and creates videos worth sharing.

Online video is big - viewership is high, and content is booming. Every brand wants to get in front of the online community in a big way, and if they don’t, they should.

strong films™ consults brands on the best use of their story, and produce a video that tells the story honestly, and beautifully. Social networks, blogs, and websites make for easy distribution methods - so the only cost incurred by the brand is for consultation, and production.

It’s easy - Hand us your story so we we can distill it, and present it to your audience.
